title: S-Rank Yuusha Party O Zenryoku De Support Shiteita No Ni Tsuihousareta Saikyou No Majutsushi Wa Party Kyoufushou Ni Natta No De Zenryoku De Ohitori-Sama Musou O Hajimeru Koto Ni Shimashita
alternative_title: Zero no Majutsushi - S-Rank Yuusha Party wo Zenryoku de Support Shiteita no ni Tsuihousareta Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Party Kyoufushou ni Natta no de Zenryoku de Ohitori-sama Musou wo Hajimeru Koto ni Shimashita ; Zero Magician - I Was Supporting the S-Rank Hero Party with All My Might. The Strongest Magician Who Was Exiled Developed a Fear of Parties. I Decided to Put All My Effort into Making Each Person Unique.
status: Zero no Majutsushi - S-Rank Yuusha Party wo Zenryoku de Support Shiteita no ni Tsuihousareta Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Party Kyoufushou ni Natta no de Zenryoku de Ohitori-sama Musou wo Hajimeru Koto ni Shimashita ; Zero Magician - I Was Supporting the S-Rank Hero Party with All My Might. The Strongest Magician Who Was Exiled Developed a Fear of Parties. I Decided to Put All My Effort into Making Each Person Unique.
description:
Description :
        Rood is a magician who was a member of an S-Rank party until he was banished from the party due to the selfish reasons of Toran, the hero. After being betrayed by his comrades, the heartbroken Rood abandoned the town he had been staying in until then, and left on a journey to the neighboring country, Roland Empire, looking to start over in a new land.
(Source: Corona EX)
